posts.content:

European governments are blaming civil unrest on their own citizens, by calling them racists when they are pissed off their wives and daughters are being raped.

Citizens will have had enough, and attempt to fight back. Their own governments will employ military forces to protect the invaders.

Conspiracy theory? Wait and see.

posts.title: ⚠️ There's ONLY 57 days until Election Day -- SIGN UP as an Election Worker TODAY! #StopTheSteal
posts.content:
My fellow Patriots!

There's only 57 days until Election Day ... and nobody is coming to save us! Our enemies are prepared and in place to steal this election once again.

We remain at the same disadvantage as we've ever been for that last eight years. Trump isn't Superman. The RNC isn't doing ANYTHING to #StopTheSteal. If our enemies steal this election, there is no lawyer, judge or court that can redeem it. We only get ONE chance on Election Day. If you're NOT applying to be a poll worker, you're part of the problem. YOUR inaction benefits our enemies -- there's ONLY us, We the People, to save this election!

SIGN UP TODAY!

posts.raw_content:
My fellow Patriots!

**There's only 57 days until Election Day** ... and nobody is coming to save us! Our enemies are prepared and in place to steal this election once again. 

We remain at the same disadvantage as we've ever been for that last eight years. Trump isn't Superman. The RNC isn't doing ANYTHING to #StopTheSteal. If our enemies steal this election, there is no lawyer, judge or court that can redeem it. We only get ONE chance on Election Day. If you're NOT applying to be a poll worker, you're part of the problem. YOUR inaction benefits our enemies -- there's ONLY us, **We the People**, to save this election!

**SIGN UP TODAY!**

**Alabama**

* [All Counties](https://www.sos.alabama.gov/alabama-votes/become-poll-worker)
* [Jefferson County](https://jeffcoprobatecourt.com/elections/pollworkers/)

* [Limestone County
](https://www.votelimestone.com/pollworkerapplication/)
